description:
The Vegas Lawyers is a full service law firm representing clients in Las Vegas based legal needs.
Practice areas are focused on criminal defense such as assault and battery, DUI, markers/casino debts, federal charges, drug crimes, and more.

The attorneys each have decades of experience practicing law. Tony Abbatangelo is a former judge, and Michael Humphreys is a former U.S. Department of Justice federal prosecutor. Their distinct backgrounds, along with a broad range of knowledge and insights, gives them a valuable advantage when representing clientsâ€™ legal interests.

The Vegas Lawyers legal team is committed to effective representation with strategies designed to achieve optimal outcomes for each client.
